text: [Music]
more than ever we feel how valuable it
is to share a meal with loved ones to
meet face to face with colleagues and to
travel to new and favorite destinations
AWS and its travel and Hospitality
competency partners are here to help
businesses provide an enhanced customer
experience on every step of the journey
this is done with industry-specific
solutions that make operations more
seamless and customer experiences more
connected and personalized hospitality
and travel companies of any size and
across every segment of the industry can
leverage these Technologies utilizing
iot sensors and computer vision AWS can
connect offline systems and devices to
the cloud this helps by unlocking siled
data and providing a centralized view of
operations these Technologies can also
help create a new convenient services
like just walk out shopping for quick
purchases while customers are on the go
using cloud-based Technologies to
collect and analyze data can provide
valuable insights about traveler and
guest preferences to help businesses
provide a personalized experience for
every customer they serve with better
customer data and personalized messaging
AWS helps create connected experiences
that increase travel and guest
engagement and build Customer Loyalty
AWS also helps businesses provide
customer assistance anytime anywhere
with centralized cloud-based contact
centers at the gate in the car at the
hotel or at home
talk with one of our experts today or
visit our website to learn more about
how AWS can help transform and modernize
your operations for a traveler and guest
experience that goes above and beyond
today's travel and Hospitality
expectations
